plot: Documentary about poet, journalist, bike-race commentator and filmmaker Jørgen Leth. He tells about his art, his life, fears and demons. Some footage of his films is shown.
title: Fra hjertet til hånden
plot_es: Documentary about poet, journalist, bike-race commentator and filmmaker Jørgen Leth. He tells about his art, his life, fears and demons. Some footage of his films is shown.
